PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-00622019-01-31,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to operationalize the changes made to the Canada Pension Plan Act by prescribing the rules necessary to calculate the amount of the additional required contributions by employees, employers and self-employed individuals, as well as to address recent amendments related to federal and Quebec legislation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0041 Publication Date: 2019-02-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to operationalize the changes made to the Canada Pension Plan Act by prescribing the rules necessary to calculate the amount of the additional required contributions by employees, employers and self-employed individuals, as well as to address recent amendments related to federal and Quebec legislation.
